Title: Redux II (3)
Plot: The Cigarette-Smoking Man helps Mulder to obtain Scully's cure and also lets him see his real sister who doesn't turn out to be as happy to see Mulder as he would've liked. In return for this, the Cigarette-Smoking Man asks that Mulder quit the FBI and work for him in the Syndicate where he could have power and respect which Mulder turns down, deciding to stay on the side of justice. GuestStars: Robert Wright, Ken Camroux, Arnie Walters, Brent Sheppard, Willy Ross, Erin Fitzgerald, Catherine Barroll, Pat Skipper, Megan Leitch
